altername_name: Decisive Battles of the American Civil War: Volume I
Decisive Battles of the American Civil War: Volume I
name: Decisive Battles of the American Civil War: Volume One: Bull Run to Chancellorsville
overview: Decisive Battles of the American Civil War Volume 1: Bull Run to Chancellorsville is a computer game developed by Roger Keating and Ian Trout and published by Strategic Studies Group in 1988 for the Commodore 64 and Apple II.
